Dear Nathalie ,

Good Day

 

Shipment collected from Dubai Mall and repacked to wooden crate

 

Total weight :68 kg

Dimension : 79 x73 x 49

 

Please prepare the export document 

 

we will also need an import invoice, from Christofle DXB to Christofle France, with same information of the export one (nature, HS code, value, ect…)

 

 

Thanks & Regards,

 

Yousuf Faizal
Air Operations

Dubai Airport Cargo Village, Warehouse No: 1404

Dubai (UAE)

P.O.Box: 123210


T:  00971 43573571

M: 00971 505174613

E: airops3@aas-shipping.com <mailto:airops3@aas-shipping.com>
